attributes.Title: Flipkart Big Billion Days 2023, Flipkart Big Billion Days 2023 Dates, Big Billion Days Mobile Offers
attributes.ClassicEditor: The Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale is all set to return this year around 10th-15th October 2023, with some of the best year-end deals on mobiles, laptops, electronics, fashion, and millions of other products available on Flipkart. Although Flipkart has not officially announced the BBD Sale dates it is expected that Flipkart Big Billion Days 2023 Sale will kickoff in the 2nd Week Of October 2023. During The Big Billion Days sale, you will get to enjoy an extra 10% Off using your Axis Bank & ICICI Bank Credit Card, along with the No Cost EMI Options. Paytm users will also get extra assured savings on the final payment page. Flipkart Plus customers will get early access to the Big Billion Days 2023 sale. Scroll below for the full schedule & offers list for this upcoming mega-sale event.  Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2023 will be also live during the same period. Flipkart will start revealing Big Billion Days sale prices from 28th September onwards.
